Name: Ghost Terminator
About the game: Let's vanish some ghosts! Shoot, run, throw grenades, explore indoor places, have some fun and get a little scared. In this action game you will be hired to terminate all the ghosts from haunted places. You will be equipped with different kinds of special anti-ghost weapons. Listen carefully to detect any ghosts that might be getting close to you, otherwise you're dead! Earn Ghost Points while killing ghosts to buy more weapons.
